about_the_game:
The official fan pack for All Our Asias! Your purchase will go towards future support of my games! The fan pack includes:

Melos Han-Tani Game Design Works: Volume 1 - All Our Asias


  • A Fan Pack-exclusive book in .pdf format, containing over 150 pages of detailed commentary on the game's artwork, story, music and level design, as well as early design sketches, unused ideas and inspirations. Don't miss it!

All Our Asias Original Soundtrack + Unused Music

  • 26 high-quality songs, from Melos Han-Tani, the developer of All Our Asias, as well as EQUIP (I Dreamed of a Palace in the Sky), _zebra (Cosmochoria OST), Bryant Canelo, and ari gateau. Also includes 10+ unused songs.

Accessing the Fan Pack

  • After purchasing and downloading the All Our Asias Fan Pack, the OST will be playable in the Steam Music Player. To access the rest of the files, go into All Our Asias's Properties in the Steam client, and find the "Browse Local Files" button. This will take you to the All Our Asias game directory, which has the Fan Pack included in it.

Tracklist


All Our Asias Original Soundtrack
All songs by Melos Han-Tani unless otherwise noted.
1. Title Screen 01:14
2. Checker Room Dream 02:20
3. Yuito and His Mother 02:52
4. White Expanse 01:56
5. White Tunnel 02:05
6. Advent Station 02:39
7. Crossroads Of The Mind 01:18
8. Rivers In The Forest 02:03
9. Memory of Nightlife 02:34
10. The Club Manager 01:14
11. Through His Father's Memories [Mountain Pass] 01:51
12. Interworld 55 02:02
13. Faster, Faster! [The Acceleration Cult] 01:46
14. Grey Space [Edge of Memory] 01:45
15. Conversing With General 03:03
16. Bryant Canelo - The Loop, Chicago 03:02
17. How Will He Live? [Chicago Overworld] 01:39
18. ari gâteau - Red Line Subway Station 02:39
19. Buried Chinatown 01:51
20. Help Them Out [Lake Shore Drive + Argyle] 05:57
21. _zebra - Innovator's Campus 03:59
22. Proposal Hearing 02:26
23. Somewhere's Meadow 02:03
24. The Checker Room (Ruined) 01:28
25. EQUIP - Narita Airport's History 03:44
26. What Will He Retain? [Credits] 02:15

All Our Asias Unused Music
All songs by Melos Han-Tani.

1. Loop Test 00:11
2. Old Advent Station 00:41
3. Old Crossroads 00:51
4. Old Forest 00:27
5. Old Manager 00:14
6. Old Title 01:09
7. Old Train Ride 00:22
8. Old Train Ride 01:35
9. prototype Area 01:11
10. Title Card 00:29
11. White Tunnel Beat 01:06
